Well, a coffin, or box to put the body in,

and it comes with a very high energy cost,
enough to heat home for almost a week.

text: Water burial.
This is where the body is put into an alkalized solution
and heated to 150 degrees centigrade.

Interesting.

Such as?

Well for one thing, it takes only 4 hours to finish. It follows the same process as when a body decomposes, but quicker.

Our first word was bleak,
meaning something unhappy, unpleasant, or without hope.
What types of things do we typically describe as bleak, Neil?
Oh, the weather in the UK can be bleak.

A grave is a hole in the earth where a body is placed.
However, there is another use.

Well, I suppose so.
